verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> of <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and <S%H4941>justice,<s%> To Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises.<s%>

I will <S%H7919>give<s%> <S%H7919>heed<s%> to the <S%H8549>blameless<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%> <S%H4970>When<s%> wilt Thou <S%H935>come<s%> to me? I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%> in the <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

I will <S%H7896>set<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1100>worthless<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> I <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H6213>work<s%> of <S%H7846>those<s%> <S%H7846>who<s%> <S%H7846>fall<s%> <S%H7846>away;<s%> It shall not <S%H1692>fasten<s%> its <S%H1692>grip<s%> on me.
A <S%H6141>perverse<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%> from me; I will <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H9563>evil.<s%>

Whoever <S%H5643>secretly<s%> <S%H3960>slanders<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> him I will <S%H6789>destroy;<s%> <S%H3808>No<s%> one who has a <S%H1364>haughty<s%> <S%H5869>look<s%> and an <S%H7342>arrogant<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> will I <S%H3201>endure.<s%>

My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall be upon the <S%H539>faithful<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> that they may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with me; He who <S%H1980>walks<s%> in a <S%H8549>blameless<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> is the <S%H1931>one<s%> who will <S%H8334>minister<s%> to me.

He who <S%H6213>practices<s%> <S%H7423>deceit<s%> shall not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> my <S%H1004>house;<s%> He who <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H8267>falsehood<s%> shall not <S%H3559>maintain<s%> his <S%H3559>position<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me.

Every <S%H1242>morning<s%> I will <S%H6789>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> So as to <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> those who <S%H6466>do<s%> <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>
